changeLog.content:
- Updated monster database 
 - Added no medal filter 
 - Fixed Chortos/Takatomon links based on merge request of Chortos
- Added more error handling on OS.Networks to handle other networks. Ignores, network if cannot be found.

- Updated Proxy Capture Messages 
 - Implemented Sort/Filtering 
 - Implemented Leader/Legacy/Evolution/Details Links 
 - Implemented dynamic changelogs

- Fixed icons for mutants and V2s 
 - Fixed Rookie and DNA viewer bugs 
 - Multiple aesthetic changes

- Proxy Implementation 
 - Deck List Parsing 
 - Rookie Viewer 
 - Medal Viewer
